about.aboutTextPart1: After nine years of loyal service in the bakery industry, I decided to change careers, primarily due to the fast-paced work environment.
about.aboutTextPart2: To reorient myself, I chose web development, a field that had interested me for a long time and which allowed me to stay in an environment where we shape a product, much like in baking.
about.aboutTextPart3: I completed training at Wild Code School, where I learned the basics of web development and the best practices in web development.
about.aboutTextPart4: Since finishing my training, I continue to practice regularly to improve my skills. I enjoy learning new things and staying curious to progress in my field.
about.hobbiesText: Apart of web development, I have a strong interest in science, particularly astronomy, which I explore through reading specialized journals. I also enjoy cooking, especially baking homemade bread and pizzas, an activity I find both creative and relaxing. Drawing is another one of my hobbies, along with playing video games, which I appreciate for their rich storytelling and immersive worlds.

project.croustiEatText: First project carried out during my training, developed using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript, this website allows users to search for restaurants in the Bordeaux region by applying filters.
project.buyAPlanetAlt: Picture of Buy A Planet website
project.buyAPlanetText: Fictional Planet Sales Website, created as part of my training, this project helped me learn the basics of React, including props and states.
project.eshopText: During my training, I developed an e-commerce site in React, focused on data retrieval via fetch() and state management.  This project allowed me to strengthen my skills with React and API integration.
project.boarderlineText: Board Game Listing Website, project developed during my training to further explore React and learn how to fetch data from a REST API.
project.geocodeText: GeoCode is a charging station management platform for electric vehicle users. It was developed as part of my training to learn how to use Express with MySQL.
project.fournilExpressText: Fournil Express is a website that connects restaurants and bakery professionals to facilitate product orders. A personal project created with Next.js.
